idea:
Hi, My Self Ashish Tiwari , By Profession i am a Software Engineer and an IT Manager , 


Problem:-


During this Covid-19 crises i analyzed and got an idea for Solution of Biggest Problem which our Country and whole world is going to face is Unemployment of Migrants (Like Labours) who left the big cities and moved back to their Native Places and they are Unemployed now,


In Coming Days its very Difficult for them to come back to Cities and Search for Employment and they don't wants to take risk their life coming to cities without Job Guarantee .


This will make massive Impact on Govt/Private Construction business as shortage of Man-power and it will slow down the country growth towards development,


Solution:-

-I Started creating a website portal and a App, where we can connect Builders/contractor who has Demand for Man-Power and the Migrants who are looking for employment with proper job security for conveyed Time Duration so that they can plan to come back to cities.


Process

-Builders/Contractor will post the requirement of Man Power Required with proper details of construction project with Duration.

- Labor and migrants can apply for work based on their interest and cities or Govt can help to collect the details of unemployed Migrants so that we can connect to them and tell them about work.

-Proper Legal authentic paper work will be done from Contractor and Builders so that Migrant will be assured of employment for mentioned Time period,

- Even if the Project get over these Migrants will be get offered for new work as per different Demands raised by Builders/Contractor for other Projects.

-This Cycle will solve the problem of Demand and Supply of Manpower between Contractor and Migrants .


This will overcome and solve the Countries Biggest Problem of unemployment of Migrants and help our country to get out of this Covid-19 Impactful Situation.


Support:- 

- Please Support me to execute this Idea to Solve Biggest Problem of Country and Help these Millions of People who are the Important Pillar of our Economy .
name: Migrants-Connect-Builders (Demand-Supply-Manpower)

idea:
1 ) The Start up through its brand name “Bima-Mandi” intends to create an online insurance web distribution platform reaching out mainly to the currently underpenetrated rural and semi urban geographies of India in accordance with local laws and regulations including IRDAI web aggregator regulations..

2) The platform will be mainly offering tailored insurance products unique to their requirements (Eg: Snake Bite Insurance, Failed Well Insurance, Sun Stroke Insurance etc.) ,some of which would be offered for the first time in India with help of our insurance Partners and post IRDA approval. These will be micro insurance products ( and affordable and tailor made to requirements of particular geogrophies of various regions) and mainly be offered to the rural/ semi urban populace of India through this digital insurance distribution platform. It will be different from standard “One size fits all” insurance products that are currently available.

3) The start up also has an objective to increase awareness amongst the target segment about the need to safeguard themselves from the vagaries that are unique to them and increase financial literacy especially in insurance arena, and the benefits of saving and risk mitigation and risk transfer. Accordingly it intends to have an online learning platform, named “Bima Paathshala” which will help them to learn in their own local language/dialects thereby helping them to make an informed decision.
name: Bima Mandi
